name: Felinus
summary: Opportunistic Feline species that disregards all treaties and agreements

name: Ferengi
summary: Humanoid. Diminutive stature, huge ears, civilization revolves around personal profit. Male-dominated culture, with subservient females.

name: Firebugs
summary: An evil race of bugs that live in the Firebug hive inside of the Lavarynth.

name: Fithp
summary: Man-sized elephant-like aliens with multiple trunks.

name: Flat cats
source: Robert A. Heinlein's The Rolling Stones, compare Tribble

name: Flood
summary: An extragalactic parasitic species that intends to assimilate all of existence into its hive mind. Controlled by a single 'Gravemind'. Primary Antagonist of Halo Series. Halo Array created to subdue the Flood by starving them to death.

name: Florauna
summary: Cycloptic, plant-like creatures from planet Flors Verdance who can control plants. They can generate seed bombs that unleash knockout gas or vines to trap enemies, stretch their arms far distances, generate thorns on their bodies, and merge with plant life.

name: Forerunner
summary: Created Halo Rings to subdue the Flood, incredibly advanced technologically, but uncertain how far.

name: Formics
source: Ender Wiggins cycle by Orson Scott Card
summary: A hive mind species resembling insects. They invaded Earth twice before being destroyed at their home planet by Andrew 'Ender' Wiggin.

name: Fulmini
summary: A race of energy beings hailing from planet Fulmas, these warlike aliens are very dangerous. Resembling stone-armored beings made of blue electricity, they are masters of controlling electricity, and are able to absorb energy as well. Their MO is to create a wormhole to a new planet and suck it dry of energy, as they need the energy to keep Fulmas from falling apart.

name: Furling (one of the Four Great Races)
